title: Ellipse
description: An ellipse, which is a closed curve on or above the surface of the Earth.

show.description: Whether or not the ellipse is shown.

semiMajorAxis.description: The length of the ellipse's semi-major axis in meters.

semiMinorAxis.description: The length of the ellipse's semi-minor axis in meters.

height.description: The altitude of the ellipse relative to the surface.

extrudedHeight.description: The altitude of the ellipse's extruded face relative to the surface.

rotation.description: The angle from north (counter-clockwise) in radians.

stRotation.description: The rotation of any applied texture coordinates.

fill.description: Whether or not the ellipse is filled.

material.description: The material to use to fill the ellipse.

outline.description: Whether or not the ellipse is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the ellipse outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the ellipse outline.

numberOfVerticalLines.description: The number of vertical lines to use when outlining an extruded ellipse.

shadows.description: Whether or not the ellipse casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying at what distance from the camera this ellipse will be displayed.
